verses.kjv: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,
See, I have called by name Bezaleel the son of Uri, the son of Hur, of the tribe of Judah:
verses.web: “Behold, I have called by name Bezalel the son of Uri, the son of Hur, of the tribe of Judah.
verses.ct: "Look — I have chosen a man by name: Bezaleel, the son of Uri and grandson of Hur, from the tribe of Judah.

verses.kjv: And I have filled him with the spirit of God, in wisdom, and in understanding, and in knowledge, and in all manner of workmanship,
verses.web: I have filled him with the Spirit of God, in wisdom, and in understanding, and in knowledge, and in all kinds of workmanship,
verses.ct: I have filled him with the spirit of God, giving him wisdom, understanding, knowledge, and skill in every kind of craft.

verses.kjv: To devise cunning works, to work in gold, and in silver, and in brass,
verses.web: to devise skillful works, to work in gold, and in silver, and in bronze,
verses.ct: He can design intricate works and shape gold, silver, and bronze.

verses.kjv: And in cutting of stones, to set them, and in carving of timber, to work in all manner of workmanship.
verses.web: and in cutting of stones for setting, and in carving of wood, to work in all kinds of workmanship.
verses.ct: He can cut and set stones, carve wood, and master every type of skilled work.

verses.kjv: And I, behold, I have given with him Aholiab, the son of Ahisamach, of the tribe of Dan: and in the hearts of all that are wise hearted I have put wisdom, that they may make all that I have commanded thee;
verses.web: Behold, I myself have appointed with him Oholiab, the son of Ahisamach, of the tribe of Dan; and in the heart of all who are wise-hearted I have put wisdom, that they may make all that I have commanded you:
verses.ct: I have also appointed Aholiab, the son of Ahisamach from the tribe of Dan, to work alongside him. Beyond that, I have given wisdom to every skilled craftsman, so they can build everything I've commanded you:

verses.kjv: The tabernacle of the congregation, and the ark of the testimony, and the mercy seat that is thereupon, and all the furniture of the tabernacle,
verses.web: the Tent of Meeting, the ark of the covenant, the mercy seat that is on it, all the furniture of the Tent,
verses.ct: the tabernacle of the congregation, the ark of the testimony, the mercy seat on top of it, and all the furnishings of the tabernacle,

verses.kjv: And the table and his furniture, and the pure candlestick with all his furniture, and the altar of incense,
verses.web: the table and its vessels, the pure lamp stand with all its vessels, the altar of incense,
verses.ct: the table and its utensils, the pure gold lampstand with all its accessories, and the altar of incense,

verses.kjv: And the altar of burnt offering with all his furniture, and the laver and his foot,
verses.web: the altar of burnt offering with all its vessels, the basin and its base,
verses.ct: the altar of burnt offering with all its utensils, and the basin with its stand,

verses.kjv: And the cloths of service, and the holy garments for Aaron the priest, and the garments of his sons, to minister in the priest’s office,
verses.web: the finely worked garments—the holy garments for Aaron the priest, the garments of his sons to minister in the priest’s office—
verses.ct: the finely woven garments — the holy garments for Aaron the priest and the garments for his sons to wear when they serve as priests,

verses.kjv: And the anointing oil, and sweet incense for the holy place: according to all that I have commanded thee shall they do.
verses.web: the anointing oil, and the incense of sweet spices for the holy place: according to all that I have commanded you they shall do.”
verses.ct: the anointing oil, and the fragrant incense for the holy place. They must make all of this exactly as I have commanded you."

verses.kjv: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,
verses.ct: Then the LORD said to Moses,

verses.kjv: Speak thou also unto the children of Israel, saying, Verily my sabbaths ye shall keep: for it is a sign between me and you throughout your generations; that ye may know that I am the LORD that doth sanctify you.
verses.web: “Speak also to the children of Israel, saying, ‘Most certainly you shall keep my Sabbaths; for it is a sign between me and you throughout your generations, that you may know that I am LORD who sanctifies you.
verses.ct: "Tell the people of Israel: 'You must keep my Sabbaths, because the Sabbath is a sign between me and you throughout every generation. It marks you as mine, so you will know that I am the LORD who sets you apart as holy.

verses.kjv: Ye shall keep the sabbath therefore; for it is holy unto you: every one that defileth it shall surely be put to death: for whosoever doeth any work therein, that soul shall be cut off from among his people.
verses.web: You shall keep the Sabbath therefore, for it is holy to you. Everyone who profanes it shall surely be put to death; for whoever does any work therein, that soul shall be cut off from among his people.
verses.ct: Keep the Sabbath, because it is holy to you. Anyone who treats it as common must be put to death. Whoever does any work on that day — that soul will be cut off from the community.

verses.kjv: Six days may work be done; but in the seventh is the sabbath of rest, holy to the LORD: whosoever doeth any work in the sabbath day, he shall surely be put to death.
verses.web: Six days shall work be done, but on the seventh day is a Sabbath of solemn rest, holy to LORD. Whoever does any work on the Sabbath day shall surely be put to death.
verses.ct: You have 6 days for work, but the 7th day is a Sabbath of complete rest, holy to the LORD. Anyone who works on the Sabbath day must be put to death.

verses.kjv: Wherefore the children of Israel shall keep the sabbath, to observe the sabbath throughout their generations, for a perpetual covenant.
verses.web: Therefore the children of Israel shall keep the Sabbath, to observe the Sabbath throughout their generations, for a perpetual covenant.
verses.ct: The people of Israel must observe the Sabbath, celebrating it through every generation as a permanent covenant.

verses.kjv: It is a sign between me and the children of Israel for ever: for in six days the LORD made heaven and earth, and on the seventh day he rested, and was refreshed.
verses.web: It is a sign between me and the children of Israel forever; for in six days LORD made heaven and earth, and on the seventh day he rested, and was refreshed.’ ”
verses.ct: It is a sign between me and the people of Israel forever, because in 6 days the LORD made heaven and earth, and on the 7th day he rested and was refreshed.'"

verses.kjv: And he gave unto Moses, when he had made an end of communing with him upon mount Sinai, two tables of testimony, tables of stone, written with the finger of God.
verses.web: When he finished speaking with him on Mount Sinai, he gave Moses the two tablets of the covenant, stone tablets, written with God’s finger.
verses.ct: When God finished speaking with Moses on Mount Sinai, he gave him the 2 tablets of the testimony — stone tablets inscribed by the finger of God.
